data.text: @Jothejovialone Thank you so much for the offer.

@egorub Sorry to hear! If they are in a University College there is support in place and it is my understanding that if they are out flatting Student Health & OUSA are working overtime on support. I am happy to do a welfare check for you anytime if you need it.

@egorub Hoping is doesn’t hit too hard and they get through it ok. 

I don’t know if the student population has been too cautious and in normal times this would be funny. Unfortunately it’s going to negatively effect a lot of kids without home base support.
@egorub Feel for you. I’m waiting for this news from my 20yo :-(
@egorub Oh lordie a 19 year old in Dunedin is enough of a worry on its own. Hope rhey are thd robust and sensible type.

@egorub Shit loads of 19 year olds in Dunedin have Covid, which is really weird given the naysayers said, young people have natural immunity.  It's like they were full of shit  and Covid-19 still doesn't give a fuck what they say.
Anyway hope your 19 is OK. PM if not, I'm local.
@egorub So did mine, its rampant down there. My boy had mild fluey symptoms for 4-5 days, says he has definitely been sicker in the past. Fingers crossed for a quick recovery
